adv: Selecting your desired measure from the left panel is incredibly easy, and you gain a very quick understanding of the underlying dataset. This is a very useful exploratory tool and could be used for many different datasets.
disadv:
* Unable to switch where measures appear on axis
* Cannot view data in a table
comment:
It could be useful to select which chart types you'd like to see recommended. e.g: 
* I only want to see barcharts
* I only want circles to represent cost of repair and not the binned cost value
